title: How to Make Model Gandum

steps.headline: Stir the wheat flour, yeast, water, salt and egg together to combine evenly into a dough.
steps.description: Set the dough aside for 30 minutes, in a warm place without drafts. This will allow the yeast time rise and increase the size of the dough.

steps.headline: Add the oil to the pot and heat it.
steps.description: Shape the dough made earlier into small balls, then put the balls into the pan.

steps.headline: Fry the balls until crispy.
steps.description: Remove from the oil and allow to drain on kitchen paper towel. Dice chop the model gandum when cool enough to handle.

steps.headline: Grind the pepper, onion, garlic, nutmeg, and cloves.
Boil the meat and water in the pot.
Put all the spices in with the meat.
steps.description: Cook it until it is done.

steps.headline: Serve the chopped model in the bowl.
steps.description: Pour the gravy over the top.

steps.headline: Put the cucumber, fried onion, sweet sauce, and ground chili in.
steps.description: The amount depends on your preference.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: It is ready to be eaten.

text: Making Model Gandum Stir the wheat flour, yeast, water, salt and egg together to combine evenly into a dough. Set the dough aside for 30 minutes, in a warm place without drafts. This will allow the yeast time rise and increase the size of the dough. Add the oil to the pot and heat it. Shape the dough made earlier into small balls, then put the balls into the pan. Fry the balls until crispy. Remove from the oil and allow to drain on kitchen paper towel. Dice chop the model gandum when cool enough to handle. Making the Gravy Grind the pepper, onion, garlic, nutmeg, and cloves. Put the powders aside. Boil the meat and water in the pot.  Put all the spices in with the meat. Cook it until it is done. Serving Serve the chopped model in the bowl. Pour the gravy over the top. Put the cucumber, fried onion, sweet sauce, and ground chili in. The amount depends on your preference. Serve. It is ready to be eaten. Finished.
